description: This file defines a React hook called useTicTacToe for managing the state and logic of a Tic Tac Toe game. It includes functions for calculating the game winner, making moves, resetting the game, and handles score persistence via localStorage. The file also exports utility functions and manages game state, player turns, and game outcomes.

methods.name: computeWinner(board)
methods.description: Determines the winner ('X', 'O', or null) for a 3x3 Tic Tac Toe board based on current state.

methods.name: useTicTacToe()
methods.description: React hook managing the Tic Tac Toe game state, including the board, current player, scores, and game outcome detection. Provides methods to make moves and reset the game.
